mapper.select: SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, CHECK_TIME AS CHECK_TIME, USED_RATE FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND CONTENTS = 'UNDO' AND DB_NAME = #{system} ORDER BY TABLESPACE_NAME, CHECK_TIME

SELECT B.USED_SIZE - A.USED_SIZE AS CHANGE_SIZE, A.TABLESPACE_NAME, B.FREE_SIZE, B.USED_SIZE, B.CURRENT_SIZE, B.FREE_RATE, ((B.USED_SIZE - A.USED_SIZE) / B.CURRENT_SIZE * 100 ) AS CHANGE_RATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - #{term}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system} AND CHECK_TIME = (SELECT MIN(CHECK_TIME) FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - #{term}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system})) A, (SELECT * FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system} AND CHECK_TIME = (SELECT MAX(CHECK_TIME) FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system})) B WHERE A.DB_NAME = B.DB_NAME AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME = B.TABLESPACE_NAME AND (B.USED_SIZE - A.USED_SIZE ) > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system} AND CHECK_TIME = (SELECT MAX(CHECK_TIME) FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system})

SELECT CHECK_YMD, TABLESPACE_NAME, CHECK_TIME, CURRENT_SIZE, FREE_SIZE, USED_SIZE, FREE_RATE, USED_RATE, MAX_SIZE FROM (SELECT CHECK_YMD, TABLESPACE_NAME, CHECK_TIME, CURRENT_SIZE, FREE_SIZE, USED_SIZE, FREE_RATE, USED_RATE, MAX_SIZE, ROWNUM AS ROW_NO FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system} AND CHECK_TIME = (SELECT MAX(CHECK_TIME) FROM TCKUNT WHERE CHECK_YMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DB_NAME = #{system}) )
WHERE ROW_NO BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * #{rows}) + 1 AND (#{page} * #{rows})
